description:
JD is a Jasper Doll, a type of artifact. He Is referred to as a "defective product" by Jet. JD also said that he (Jet) is just like him (himself).
It seems that JD belonged to the Foundation, but somehow managed to escape and is now wanted. Hence, he avoided meeting the Foundation as much as he could, for fear of being taken away by them by force.
He always wants to see Angelique smile. He enjoys baking for others, often cookies or scones.
He fights with a pair of tonfa against Thanatos but possesses melee skills as well.
Source: Wiki
name: J.D.
